author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

~~This is currently a draft - tests are in progress on PPS side, expected to be concluded on Mon 11 May.~~ EDIT on 14 May: draft status removed, no more changes to this PR expected.

This PR contains updates conceived for UL re-miniAOD campaign. These updates are intended to be used with updated conditions currently in tags CTPPSRPAlignment_real_offline_v8 + PPSOpticalFunctions_offline_v7

#### PR validation:

A test summary is shown below:
  * blue: before this PR, with old conditions (thus UL re-reco state)
  * red dashed: with this PR, with updated conditions

![make_cmp_11_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17830858/81382475-bfb37400-910e-11ea-965d-f73ab8a5a753.png)

The comparison demonstrates the improvements
  * improved reco efficiency: mainly 2018 low xi, also 2017
  * theta*_y better centred around 0: mainly 2018, also 2017
  * larger fraction of protons with timing info: 2017 and 2018
  * time of protons without timing info: changed to -999, thus outside physical/reasonable range
title: PPS: updates for re-miniAOD
